Tom,
Just wanted folks to see an example that was different
than the norm we typically see from Higo and Shonai.

P.S. I was amused to see the one you recalled
in Ginza Choshuya as late as March when I was there.
Priced at 850,000 JPY. Koshirae only.
I had sold the piece (with katana attributed
to Owari Seki) about 8 yrs. ago at a sword show
to a Japanese dealer. Small world.

Regards,
Cary Condell

tom helm wrote:
> Very nice Cary,
>       and a bargain at that price, but dare I say it a bit garish
> even for me! I much prefer your OTHER Toppei which I think is
> exemplary of the style.
> -Tom
